title: JoyMarsha
author: JoyMarsha
content: As the world is growing technology-wise and economic wise. I have concluded that I won't quickly put myself in doubt about what am being told or hear over the news but I will rather have a deep think over the information I absorb in my daily life. I will always take my time to think about everything QuoteDon't jump to the conclusion that something is false or that the Bible forbids it if someone claims that death and aging may be prevented. Make some research and give the subject some serious thought.If somebody claims that cryptocurrency is the future. Do not immediately label it a scam. Spend some time learning about the technology behind crypto.If you don't understand what is been said to you, don't make blind arguments or conclude fast. Just make research on it for better understanding and exposure. With that methods, you will be able to sharpen your intelligence on what can be possible or not.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Every information exist on the internet a wise use of the search engines available will give so many insight or detail about anything that isn't clear or warrants doubt. Crypto investment is one delicate investment so been extremely careful both in risking the funds and doing the research goes a long way to reduce chances of losing funds. Just like a wise proverb goes "look before you leap".Not all information on the internet are genuine verifying the authenticity of the site, how many visitors it receives within a particular time frame can give a clue of how others rate the project.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: A problem would be this, once there's one crypto that will scam people, it will damage the entire cryptocurrencies and one of the major get affected is Bitcoin.  Because they didn't understand yet first how it will work, another factors also these, there are too many victims of Bitcoin double scams or in a cloud mining investment, and once they get failed, they called Bitcoin a scam. So I tend to agree with the OP, have deep research before jumping into Bitcoin investment.  I don't know about altcoins but it seems 1 or 2 of them are potentially good IMO.However, there's always progress that I've seen which keeps spreading awareness, and this might be the reason Bitcoin adoption also spread faster than before.

I have concluded that I won't quickly put myself in doubt about what am being told or hear over the news but I will rather have a deep think over the information I absorb in my daily life. I will always take my time to think about everything Agreed on the first part, but I am curious how do you get time to think about everything you heard on the news? I researched only something when that news interests me, otherwise, I don't give a damn about any opinions of people about the news or topic. Quote from: sheenshane on January 17, 2023, 10:59:31 PMSo I tend to agree with the OP, have deep research before jumping into Bitcoin investment.For me it was a quick involvement in bitcoin, my research was like- what is bitcoin and how can I sell my bitcoin? What is the current price of bitcoin and the bitcoin price chart? But now I don't call them a deep research

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: QuoteIf somebody claims that cryptocurrency is the future. Do not immediately label it a scam.That's a very broad and vague statement.Future of what? Future of money? It is never going to happen. In the foreseeable future fiat will remain the future of money (the same fiat that is not even money). Cryptocurrencies will remain an alternative.Besides, majority of altcoins are indeed scams and they have no future to begin with. Many of them are dying as we speak and being replaced by other useless coins.

comments.author: Bholutefe
comments.body: Having a critical thinking about what is and what is not is a very essential factor to consider when making any form of decision, making assumptions is not quite advisable in making an opinion. You choose your choice rightly especially when selecting any form of coin apart from BTC. Other coins have their own values in one way or other while some are not advisable to settle for at all. That is why it is good to make our findings right and trust no one when investing on any form of coin, anyone can mislead you while you even know better than them. There are other articles and legends that can put you through any dark corners you think you ain’t getting right and once you get your facts right, you can proceed with your choice making.

comments.author: Apraun Seupot
comments.body: I completely agree with this sentiment. In the age of social media and instant gratification, it's easy to get caught up in the hype and jump to conclusions without fully understanding the facts. For me, It's also important to keep an open mind and not dismiss something just because it's new or unfamiliar. As the world changes and new technologies emerge, like a natural to feel a bit skeptical or uncertain. In other hand, instead of immediately labeling something as a scam or false, it's better to take the time to learn about it and understand the underlying technology or principles behind it.

comments.author: monedauno
comments.body: # CHAPTER FOUR# The Art of ThinkingIt is no secret This is a fact that has been known for a long time. It is an important fact that every day.In the course of our day-to-day lives, we tend to get caught up in the flow of information. There is no time to waste. The information is in our hands and we need to be able to do our best to keep it safe.One of the most important things we can do is to focus on what we are doing and not what we think we are doing. When we are bombarded with information, we have to look at it in a different way. We need to be able to see the big picture and make decisions based on it.The art of thinking It is a way of thinking about the world and how we are going to live it.# INTRODUCTION# THE ART OF THINK
